title: What iPhones will iOS 13 run on? - Quora

response.answer_text: There’s no way of knowing but we can try to guess. Let’s look at the statistics: iPhone 4 came with iOS 4 and received iOS 7 -> 4 years of support and 3 major updates iPhone 4S came with iOS 5 and received iOS 9 -> 5 years of support and 4 major updates iPhone 5 came with iOS 6 and received iOS 10 -> 5 years of support and 4 major updates iPhone 5S came with iOS 7 and received iOS 12 -> 6 years of support and 5 major updates (So far!) Since iOS 12 was designed to optimize the experience of older iPhones, I don’t think iPhone 5S will receive iOS 13. So if I were to guess, I would say the iPhones that will receive iOS 13 will be: iPhone 6, 6S, 7, 8, X, XS, XR and SE.

The phones that will run iOS 13 are the iPhone 6S, the iPhone SE and all the more recently phones (7, 7S, 8, X, XS, XR) and the new phone(s) that will be introduced in late September and released in early October. (Those months are guesses from past experience, Apple has made no announcements of availability in any way yet. They routinely don’t hint those things.)
